downloadDescription: Now that you've set up your Microsoft Teams Rooms, dive deeper into features, learn how to drive adoption and common troubleshooting scenarios.

detailsSection: Now that you've set up your Microsoft Teams Rooms, dive deeper to better understand additional Teams Rooms features, learn how to drive adoption, and learn how to troubleshoot.

installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
